author: MarioSoundtrack

text: +SupraDarky I'm enjoying Super's rewrites of the films, I think Resurrection 'F' has a lot more room to improve, which I think it will. Judging from the manga chapters, Universe 6 is looking to be awesome too!
author: SaiyanZ3

text:
+SupraDarky Super is garbage so far, terrible animation and pacing.
It's also quite uncreative and recycling heavy, and Toriyama forgot like half of the things he had established in Z, especially power levels are completely wrong and all over the place.
I hope it gets better but so far it's really disappointing.
author: Max

text: +Maximilian Stärk Which is to say, it is the same as ever, as Power levels never really worked. It might not be amazing, but it is good enough for the purpose it is serving, that is, to make the viewers feel nostalgic about the old series and to satisfy those who crave more of the same. This is Dragon Ball. Being repetitive is what Dragon Ball is.
author: fomme397

text: On another note, I've just started following this channel and I'm quite frankly overwhelmed by the staggering amount of music you've collected in this channel. How many games did you actually play? I do enjoy video games myself a lot, but were I to make a list, it wouldn't even begin to compare to this, so I am rather stunned at seeing this.
author: fomme397
